sentences.sContent: So the exuberant young girl with dark hair and blue eyes decided to become a screen actress.
sentences.sCn: 因此，这个充满活力的年轻黑发碧眼女孩决定成为一名荧屏演员。

synos.tran: 繁茂的；生气勃勃的，充溢的

words.tran: 生气勃勃地；丰富地；繁茂地

trans.tranOther: If you are exuberant, you are full of energy, excitement, and cheerfulness
